mathematica: z={}; current=1; Timing[ Do[ If[ If[ (t=Sin[ n ])>0, t, 1 ]<current, AppendTo[ z, current=t ] ], {n, 105000 } ] ]; z  (* _Wouter Meeussen_ *)
